parameters.name: CommandId
parameters.description:
The ID of the command that you want to approve.

>  You can call the [ListApproveCommands](~~2584310~~) operation to query the IDs of all commands that need to be reviewed.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host.

>  You can call the DescribeInstances operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host.

>  For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
